intro.title: Romancing Tribeca
intro.para: In a nod to this distinguished Italian Renaissance building and its Parisian counterparts, Jeffrey Beers International juxtaposes classic details—oversized moldings, chevron-patterned oak floors—with contemporary touches for these 152 highly-appointed residences. From the outside, 108 Leonard is an historic landmark that pays homage to a gilded bygone era; on the inside, it is a bright canvas of modern restraint, ready to adapt to one's individual lifestyle.

slides.caption: Ceiling heights range from approximately 10' to over 14'
slides.detail: Original restored windows and five inch wide oak floors bring authentic European glamour to organically flowing layouts.

slides.caption: Each residence has been optimized for space and warmth
slides.detail: Gallery walls are awash in lighting tucked behind recessed coves, offering illuminated spaces for burgeoning art collectors.

slides.caption: Kitchen in Sand Palette
slides.detail: Open-plan kitchens have been thoughtfully conceived in two palettes, sheathed in marble backsplashes and anchored by stunning marble waterfall islands.

slides.caption: Kitchen in Ash Palette
slides.detail: Kitchens feature top-of-the-line appliances by Miele.
